item.text: Elisha replied, “Listen to the Lord’s message. This is what the Lord has said, ‘About this time tomorrow a seah of finely milled flour will sell for a shekel and two seahs of barley for a shekel at the gate of Samaria.’”

An officer who was the king’s right-hand man responded to the prophet, “Look, even if the Lord made it rain by opening holes in the sky, could this happen so soon?” Elisha said, “Look, you will see it happen with your own eyes, but you will not eat any of the food!”
Now four men with a skin disease were sitting at the entrance of the city gate. They said to one another, “Why are we just sitting here waiting to die?

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> we <st data-num="0559 0935">go into</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>, we’ll <st data-num="04191 08033">die</st> of <st data-num="07458 05892">starvation</st>,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> we <st data-num="03427" class="">stay</st> <st data-num="06311" class="">here</st> we’ll <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st>! <st data-num="06258" class="">So</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">come on</st>, let’s <st data-num="05307" class="">defect</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="0758" class="">Syrian</st> <st data-num="04264" class="">camp</st>! <st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> they <st data-num="02421" class="">spare</st> us,<n id="3" /> we’ll <st data-num="02421" class="">live</st>; <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> they <st data-num="04191" class="">kill</st> us—well, we were going to <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st> anyway.”<n id="4" />

So they <st data-num="06965" class="">started</st> <st data-num="0935 0413">toward</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="0758" class="">Syrian</st> <st data-num="04264" class="">camp</st> at <st data-num="05399" class="">dusk</st>. When they <st data-num="0935 05704">reached</st> the <st data-num="07097" class="">edge</st> of the <st data-num="0758" class="">Syrian</st> <st data-num="04264" class="">camp</st>, <st data-num="02009" class="">there</st> was <st data-num="0369" class="">no</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">one</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st>.

The <st data-num="0136" class="">Lord</st> had caused the <st data-num="0758" class="">Syrian</st> <st data-num="04264" class="">camp</st> to <st data-num="08085" class="">hear</st> the <st data-num="06963" class="">sound</st> of <st data-num="07393" class="">chariots</st> <st data-num="06963" class="">and</st> <st data-num="05483" class="">horses</st> <st data-num="06963" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="01419" class="">large</st> <st data-num="02428" class="">army</st>. Then they <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">one</st> <st data-num="0251" class="">another</st>, “<st data-num="02009" class="">Look</st>, the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> has <st data-num="07936 05921">paid</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st> of the <st data-num="02850" class="">Hittites</st> and <st data-num="04714" class="">Egyptians</st> to <st data-num="0935 05921">attack</st> us!”

So they <st data-num="06965" class="">got up</st> and <st data-num="05127" class="">fled</st> at <st data-num="05399" class="">dusk</st>, <st data-num="05800" class="">leaving</st> behind their <st data-num="0168" class="">tents</st>, <st data-num="05483" class="">horses</st>, and <st data-num="02543" class="">donkeys</st>. They left the <st data-num="04264" class="">camp</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">as</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> was and <st data-num="05127" class="">ran</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">for</st> their <st data-num="05315" class="">lives</st>.

When <st data-num="0428" class="">the</st> men <st data-num="06879" class="">with a skin disease</st> <st data-num="0935 05704">reached</st> the <st data-num="07097" class="">edge</st> of the <st data-num="04264" class="">camp</st>, they <st data-num="0935 0413">entered</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">a</st> <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> and <st data-num="0398 08354">had a meal</st>.<n id="1" /> They also <st data-num="05375 08033">took</st> some <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st>, <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st>, and <st data-num="0899" class="">clothes</st> and <st data-num="01980" class="">went</st> and <st data-num="02934" class="">hid</st> it all.<n id="2" /> Then they <st data-num="07725" class="">went back</st> and <st data-num="0935 0413">entered</st> <st data-num="0312" class="">another</st> <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st>. They <st data-num="05375 08033">looted</st> it<n id="3" /> and <st data-num="01980" class="">went</st> and <st data-num="02934" class="">hid</st> what they had taken.

Then they <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">one</st> <st data-num="07453" class="">another</st>, “It’s <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03651" class="">right</st> what <st data-num="0587" class="">we</st>’re <st data-num="06213" class="">doing</st>! <st data-num="03117 02088">This</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> to <st data-num="01309" class="">celebrate</st>, but <st data-num="0587" class="">we</st> <st data-num="02814" class="">haven’t told</st> anyone.<n id="1" /> If we <st data-num="02442" class="">wait</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> <st data-num="0216 01242">dawn</st>,<n id="2" /> we’ll <st data-num="04672 05771">be punished</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="06258" class="">So</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">come on</st>, let’s <st data-num="0935" class="">go</st> and <st data-num="05046" class="">inform</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">royal</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">palace</st>.”

So they <st data-num="0935" class="">went</st> and <st data-num="07121" class="">called out</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="07778" class="">gatekeepers</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>. They <st data-num="05046 0559">told</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">them</st>, “We <st data-num="0935 0413">entered</st> the <st data-num="0758" class="">Syrian</st> <st data-num="04264" class="">camp</st> and <st data-num="02009" class="">there</st> was <st data-num="0369" class="">no</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">one</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st>. We didn’t even hear a <st data-num="0120" class="">man’s</st> <st data-num="06963" class="">voice</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03588 0518">But</st> the <st data-num="05483" class="">horses</st> and <st data-num="02543" class="">donkeys</st> are still <st data-num="0631" class="">tied up</st>, and the <st data-num="0168" class="">tents</st> <st data-num="0834 01992">remain up</st>.”<n id="3" />
The gatekeepers relayed the news to the royal palace.

The king got up in the night and said to his advisers, “I will tell you what the Syrians have done to us. They know we are starving, so they left the camp and hid in the field, thinking, ‘When they come out of the city, we will capture them alive and enter the city.’”

<st data-num="0259" class="">One</st> of his <st data-num="05650" class="">advisers</st> <st data-num="06030 0559">replied</st>, “Pick some men and <st data-num="04994" class="">have</st> them <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> <st data-num="02568" class="">five</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="05483 07604">horses</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> are <st data-num="07604" class="">left</st> in the city. (Even if they are killed, their <st data-num="02009" class="">fate</st> will be no different than that of <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="03478" class="">Israelite</st> <st data-num="01995" class="">people</st>—<st data-num="0834" class="">we’re all</st> <st data-num="08552" class="">going to die</st>!)<n id="1" /> Let’s <st data-num="07971" class="">send</st> them <st data-num="07971" class="">out</st> so we can <st data-num="07200" class="">know for sure</st> what’s going on.”<n id="2" />

So they <st data-num="03947" class="">picked</st> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="07393 05483">horsemen</st> and the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> them <st data-num="07971" class="">out</st> to <st data-num="0310" class="">track</st> the <st data-num="0758" class="">Syrian</st> <st data-num="04264" class="">army</st>.<n id="1" /> He <st data-num="0559" class="">ordered</st> them, “<st data-num="01980" class="">Go</st> and <st data-num="07200" class="">find out</st> what’s going on.”<n id="2" />

So they <st data-num="01980 0310">tracked</st> them<n id="1" /> <st data-num="05704" class="">as far as</st> the <st data-num="03383" class="">Jordan</st>. The <st data-num="02009 03605 01870">road</st> was <st data-num="04392" class="">filled</st> with <st data-num="0899" class="">clothes</st> and <st data-num="03627" class="">equipment</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="0758" class="">Syrians</st> had <st data-num="07993" class="">discarded</st> in their <st data-num="02648" class="">haste</st>.<n id="2" /> The <st data-num="04397" class="">scouts</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="07725" class="">went back</st> and <st data-num="05046" class="">told</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>.
Then the people went out and looted the Syrian camp. A seah of finely milled flour sold for a shekel, and two seahs of barley for a shekel, just as in the Lord’s message.

Now the king had placed the officer who was his right-hand man at the city gate. When the people rushed out, they trampled him to death in the gate. This fulfilled the prophet’s word which he had spoken when the king tried to arrest him.

The <st data-num="0376 0430">prophet</st> had <st data-num="01961 01696 0413 0559">told</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>, “Two <st data-num="05429" class="">seahs</st> of <st data-num="08184" class="">barley</st> will sell for a <st data-num="08255" class="">shekel</st>, and a <st data-num="05429" class="">seah</st> of <st data-num="05560" class="">finely milled flour</st> for a <st data-num="08255" class="">shekel</st>; this will <st data-num="01961" class="">happen</st> about this <st data-num="06256" class="">time</st> <st data-num="04279" class="">tomorrow</st> in the <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> of <st data-num="08111" class="">Samaria</st>.”

But the officer had replied to the prophet, “Look, even if the Lord made it rain by opening holes in the sky, could this happen so soon?” Elisha had said, “Look, you will see it happen with your own eyes, but you will not eat any of the food!”
This is exactly what happened to him. The people trampled him to death in the city gate.
